description: Parking near highway. Approx 1 hr of steep uphill through forest.  Granite slab walking above treeline the rest of the way.  Beautiful!  See same peak described in another trailpeak entry hereDistance of 13km is return distance.
directions: Drive from Hope up Hwy#5, park at highways maintenance yard opposite the highway rest area about 5 kms  south of the toll booths.  Trail head is at the back of the highways maintenance area, creek crossing is the start.
title: Needle Peak off the Coquihalla - Winter
